evidence.text: Over four days of evidentiary presentation and oral argument between August 6 and August 13, 2025, the Court heard testimony from ten witnesses and viewed over a hundred exhibits.
After hearing additional argument, the Court granted Plaintiffs’ narrow request for a TRO, halting further expansion of the site for fourteen days.

extracted.value: Preliminary Injunction Hearing held August 6, 7, 12, and 13, 2025, with Temporary Restraining Order granted August 7, 2025, halting further expansion of the detention site for fourteen days

evidence.source_document: Motion to Stay Preliminary Injunction Pending Appeal and for Administrative Stay
evidence.text: At 8:47 p.m. on August 21—the last day of the TRO period—the court entered a preliminary injunction requiring Defendants to (i) immediately cease bringing new detainees to the facility, (ii) immediately cease new construction, and (iii) remove all new lighting, fencing, and utilities within sixty days—effectively shuttering the facility. Doc. 131 80-81.

extracted.value: Preliminary Injunction entered on 08/21/2025 requiring Defendants to cease bringing new detainees, cease new construction, and remove lighting/fencing/utilities within 60 days
